item.title: GW4 PhD Studentship
item.description: A PhD studentship is available in the lab (commencing in October 2020). This studentship consists of full UK/EU tuition fees, as well as a Doctoral Stipend matching UK Research Council National Minimum (Â£15,009 p.a. for 2019-20, updated yearly). We welcome applicants with all backgrounds (e.g. Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, Physics, Bioinformatics, Pharmacy, Biology or Medicine) and the studentship can fund additional training to assist discipline conversion. The studentship will be 3.
